description: Listed Building Consent in connection with replacement of front door and windows (some double glazed, some single glazed with secondary glazing), and boiler flue and extract grille, with internal alterations including alterations to partitions, replacement of internal joinery and dry lining internal walls.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  Notwithstanding the details shown in the approved plans, further large scale details of the new casement windows shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing before these works commence on site.  If the double glazed windows have to be storm proofed or contain trickle vents then single glazed casement windows shall be used instead.  The works shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

REASON:  In order to safeguard the special architectural or historic interest of the building included in the Statutory List.
